amendment.description: An amendment numbered 52 printed in House Report 115-259 to reduce the Weapons Activities--Recapitalization--Infrastructure to the Presidents Budget level and increases the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 247 (Roll no. 423).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 247 (Roll no. 423).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
